response.overview: The hero is a sales boy who loves music and strives to make a name for himself in music.At the same time their sales are deteriorating health.The doctor who will be hospitalized says the operation will cost 4 lakhs of money,At the same time as the hero tries for money a girl becomes parichayam. He falls in love with that girl, does that girl love him? The rest is the story of how they protect their mother.
response.title: Aaratam
